title: [Glimae'den Wildwood, Trail]
description: The trail continues its twisting climb, and signs of recent maintenance are evident from split timbers that line the sides of the trodden path.  Low tanik bushes sporting slender thorns threaten to jab all those that pass too close.

The trail continues its twisting climb, and signs of recent maintenance are evident from split timbers that line the sides of the trodden path.  A wispy scarlet ribbon, slightly frayed along the ends, dangles forlornly from the branch of a low tanik bush sporting slender thorns.
